name: Lester San Juan
title: Software Engineer
summary: Software Engineer with experience building full‑stack products, APIs, and data‑driven features. Comfortable across frontend (Vue/React), backend (Node/FastAPI), and ML/NLP pipelines. Strong focus on usability, automation, and measurable impact.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Integrated QuickBooks API for automated invoicing, replacing manual invoice creation to streamline the order‑to‑invoice workflow and reduce processing time.
Developed capabilities for receivables, shipment tracking, product catalog with image uploads, and admin dashboard with business auditing for scalable multi‑tenant operations.
Implemented secure JWT authentication with admin/manager/customer roles and cross‑business data access controls.
Created dynamic, business‑scoped filtering for products/orders with reactive UI updates and secure API integration.

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
highlights: Built a backend job scheduling system optimizing task assignment to improve efficiency and reduce admin workload.
Shipped custom operations software to streamline store processes, cutting administrative labor by ~40%.
Automated manual workflows, reducing scheduling errors and improving task tracking.
Ran user feedback sessions with staff to refine the UI for clarity and ease of use.

projects.name: GetMentored
highlights: Engineered communication between front‑end and back‑end systems for seamless UX and content handling.
Used FaunaDB for robust storage, retrieval, and real‑time updates; contributed to open‑source libs.
Translated client goals into concrete website/software requirements and milestones.
Prototyped user flows in Figma and tested journeys to improve intuitiveness.

projects.name: SVMMARY: Summarization App
highlights: Built an AI‑assisted app that summarizes long‑form text using Next.js and React.
Added a real‑time sidebar that fetches and displays snippets from the backend.
Designed a responsive UI in Tailwind with a sticky history panel for user‑specific summaries.
Exposed REST endpoints to integrate with external AI models and tuned for performance.

projects.name: Dynamic Scheduler
highlights: Automated part‑time work scheduling with Python and custom optimization for 20+ employees.
Handled availability, preferences, and fairness while avoiding conflicts.
Enabled real‑time constraint editing with instant recomputation.
Cut schedule creation time by ~50%.

projects.name: SunrightHub
highlights: Unified operations in a single hub for team collaboration and resource management.
Integrated automated scheduling to reduce manual workload and errors.
Established a modular TypeScript React codebase for rapid adoption and real‑time updates.
Validated usability via user tests; improved task completion and navigation.

projects.name: Yelp Sentiment Analyzer
highlights: Built sentiment classifier for Yelp reviews; achieved >90% accuracy.
Leveraged SBERT embeddings for rich text features.
Used dropout and custom loss to improve generalization by ~25% over baselines.
Optimized training with adaptive learning rates and class balancing.
